meanings.definition: A person who derives pleasure from inflicting pain or humiliation on others.
meanings.sent1: The sadists in the horror movie enjoyed torturing their victims.
meanings.sent2: The sadists at the haunted house scared visitors for fun.
meanings.sent3: The sadists at the comedy club kept telling bad jokes to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The sadists of nature unleashed a storm of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The sadists in the video game reveled in causing chaos and mayhem.

meanings.definition: Those who enjoy causing suffering to others.
meanings.sent1: The sadists in the story took pleasure in making others miserable.
meanings.sent2: The sadists on the playground bullied their classmates.
meanings.sent3: The sadists at the party kept playing pranks on everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sadists of the internet spread negativity and hate.
meanings.sent5: The sadists in the movie relished in the pain they caused to their victims.
